text: Michael Scholz (January 26, 1949) is a German singer, composer and producer. Between 1984 and 2000 he worked with Dieter Bohlen in Modern Talking and Blue System, as part of the chorus. Since 2003 he works on his music group, Systems in Blue, with Rolf KÃ¶hler and Detlef Wiedeke. His voice type is falsetto.
